sentences.sContent: The actress demonstrated thespian talents at her first audition.
sentences.sContent_eng: The actress demonstrated thespian talents at her first audition.
sentences.sCn: 这位女演员第一次试镜就展现出戏剧天分。

sentences.sContent: She enjoys acting in plays and joined the school's thespian club.
sentences.sContent_eng: She enjoys acting in plays and joined the school's thespian club.
sentences.sCn: 她喜欢戏剧表演，而且还加入了学校的戏剧社团。

sentences.sContent: Calligraphy class frame beat class ancient kite class thespian performance class.
sentences.sContent_eng: Calligraphy class frame beat class ancient kite class thespian performance class.
sentences.sCn: 书法班、架子鼓班、古筝班、戏剧表演班等。

remMethod.val: 来自古希腊悲剧创始者Thespis

trans.tranOther: Thespian means relating to drama and the theatre
